attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to see him and his ways and understand him but instead I was left with a boring malfunctioning lazy app. I have good WiFi and storage so obviously it‚Äôs the app that‚Äôs the problem. But also having such a nasty person as president shouldn‚Äôt be allowed and I totally disagree with everything this app has to do within the limits of 2020 at this exact moment. 

Another thing I have a 9 year old cat who‚Äôs very skittish and she ran at the sight of anything to do with the app. In fact she got so mad I had it she slapped me and now I have scratches on me. And then my 13 year old dog decided to bite my foot and it was bleeding because of the chaotic music and fake news spreading around.

If anything this app is all fake news and nothing is real. I will never ever download again because this app like I said is disgusting.

 Also it asks you for your information which is kinda dumb because what if he‚Äôs actually tracking your every move. Like ew yikes.
attributes.title: Never Again!

attributes.review: The is so bad it took 4 hours just to download! Not only that it kept on taking me off the app every time I tried to go on it. When it finally let me go on it, it glitched out like crazy!!! When it stopped it all went black and I saw President Cheetos, he said ‚Äúget off the app you Mexican!‚Äù Then it went black to normal. This app seems to be poorly made it was glitchy, slow, and wouldn‚Äôt let me do anything! I got a text saying ‚Äúget off the app you Mexican!‚Äù How did he know I was Mexican?! 2 days later he came to my house and burnt my geko and said ‚ÄúI told you to get off the app you Mexican!‚Äù I used to support President Cheeto but now I don‚Äôt he‚Äôs a meanie!

attributes.review: After downloading the app I had troubles as expected but I‚Äôd figure I‚Äôll give it a chance like any other app. That‚Äôs when my problems started to occur. On another occasion I was watching Netflix with my girlfriend and out of nowhere the gummy bear song in German started to play now my house is infested with mosquitos playing jazz flutes. From the bottom of my heart will the developers fix these problems.
attributes.title: Weird noises

attributes.review: i opened this app and was immediately greeted with an image of an overgrown old tall fat orange oddly shaped. this app was poorly designed and horribly executed and i‚Äôm not sure what idiot thought of making this but they shouldn‚Äôt have rights. i was bombarded with poorly written articles and bad videos supporting an idiot. this app is as if the annoying orange had a worse version that was still annoying but now idiotic, racist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, sexist, and much more worse things that NOBODY should support. the orange this stoopid app was supporting should be left on pluto with all its worst fears, immigrants, strong females, and the homos. delete this app immediately.
attributes.title: #anyonebuttrump2020

attributes.review:
I got this app because I wanted to see what our orange president is saying. Well news flash!!!! TRUMP IS A BAD PRESIDENT!!! 
And if you can‚Äôt see why, then your too blind and arrogant. Multiple times our orange president has tried to take away our human rights, and he is a racist/rapist. 
I don‚Äôt understand why people support him if he can‚Äôt even fulfill his promises. 
Not only that, but he doesn‚Äôt even admit if he does something wrong. He blames whatever it was on someone else. There‚Äôs proof out there if you look for it proving that trump isn‚Äôt the president that you see him as. I hope you gain some more brain cells to understand that. üçä

attributes.review: The news is fake but what‚Äôs new this entire presidency is fake. I logged on to see the differences and biases on what he accepts and reports as a credible news source. attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.title: Literally 0 Logic

attributes.review: This app is literally an big waste of space, it took the absolute longest to download. Now that I am actually on this app my phone is glitching and the app even moves slow. My great grandmother tried getting the app, as soon as she pressed download she fell down the stairs and broke 3 ribs. This app is horrible.
attributes.title: Do not download

This app is just crawling with viruses as well. My phone glitched out a bit as soon as it finally downloaded. I warn you, DONT. GET. THIS. APP
